ProductInfo.Features:
720p Resolution With almost 1 million pixels available, 720p resolution helps breathe new life into your favorite programs, movies and games.
Built-in Wi-Fi Enjoy convenient in-home connectivity without the cable clutter to stream content from your media server or the internet.
DynaLight Increase detail and depth of the images on your screen with DynaLight, a technology that monitors the brightness level of each video frame, even in low light settings.
USB (Video, Music, Photo) Easily connect to your favorite videos, music, and photos via USB.
Net TV with Yahoo! Widgets Do you ever want to see what?s going on in the world without changing the channel. Now you can!
ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba 32SL415U 32.0 - Inch 720i 60Hz LED TV
